content: I'm trying to get organized and I need some help with decluttering my bookshelves. I've already arranged all my fiction books by author, but I'm stuck on my non-fiction section. Do you have any tips on how to organize non-fiction books in a way that makes sense? By the way, I've arranged for a local charity to come collect some items from my home next Saturday, so I'm trying to get everything sorted out beforehand.
